biotools.summary: BioSWITCH iis a command-line program using the BioPAX standardised language to “switch on” static regulatory networks so that they can be executed in GINML to predict cellular behaviour. Using a previously published haematopoiesis gene network, we show that BioSWITCH successfully and faithfully automates the network de-coding and re-coding into an executable logical network. BioSWITCH also supports the integration of a BioPAX model into an existing GINML graph.
